properties.title: Locorama - Railway adventure park
properties.abstract: The old engine depot, situated within walking distance from the station and the Romanshorn harbour, offers live railway history.
properties.description:
Thurgau's last steam engine, the central Thurgau railway's historical Ec 3/5 demonstrates the steam engine age together with the enormous express steam engine S 3/6 from the Bavarian state railway. A historic post wagon, a salon wagon and a buffet car invite you to linger in their nostalgic rooms. Visits to other historic vehicles can be expected; at special times the garden railway travels around the 1:1 track.

Last but not least, the 6-track, 50m-long engine garage and the outside area with 20m turntable, water standpipe and coal shed create a special atmosphere for entertainment and fun.
